<blueprint>
Service TemperatureConverter {
  description: "Converts temperatures between different scales",
  
  methods: {
    fahrenheitToCelsius(fahrenheit: decimal) -> decimal {
      preconditions: [fahrenheit is valid temperature],
      postconditions: [returns accurate Celsius conversion],
      errors: []
    }
  }
}

  value: decimal,
  scale: TemperatureScale
}

  enum: ["Fahrenheit", "Celsius", "Kelvin"]
}

  input: {value: 65.0, scale: "Fahrenheit"},
  formula: "(F - 32) * 5/9",
  result: {value: 18.33, scale: "Celsius"},
  operation: "temperature conversion"
}

  fahrenheit: {min: -459.67, max: 10000},
  celsius: {min: -273.15, max: 5500}
}
</blueprint>
